input.name: register-i3-value
input.class: w-20 text-center rounded-md border border-gray-800 px-3 py-1 focus:border-blue-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200

input.name: register-i3-sign
input.class: w-10 text-center rounded-md border border-gray-800 px-3 py-1 focus:border-blue-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200

input.name: register-i3-byte1
input.class: w-10 text-center rounded-md border border-gray-800 px-3 py-1 focus:border-blue-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200

input.name: register-i3-byte2
input.class: w-10 text-center rounded-md border border-gray-800 px-3 py-1 focus:border-blue-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200
